name: Monster Hunter 4
description:
Monster Hunter 4 is an action-RPG game developed by Capcom Production Studio 1. It came out on 14-09-2013. Capcom published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Monster Hunter 4 on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Hironobu Takeshita. Kaname Fujioka directed the game. It was scored by Marika Suzuki, Miwako Chinone and Reo Uratani.
